title: [OCE] Achievement Board
body:
Hey there Summoners,

Basically. I created a thread a while back on the old forums which was essentially like a diary. A thread that would continually get updated with the daily achievements I had made on League. e.g. achieving X amount of League Points or completing promos etc. That said I was unable to continue updating as time went on. But with the BOARDS I want to try and resurrect my old thread here.

**So the point of this thread is just to post any achievements you have achieved each day no matter how big or how small. **

Most recently I played a game as Karma jungle after seeing Diamondprox do it. It went pretty well. 

On to you.
lols =)

Note: OPGG still hasn't updated its champion and items databases. No Kalista or new Jungle items listed.

replies.body: Woo, Karma Jungle! How does she feel in the new Jungle? I tried her out a time or two before, but have been a bit scared to try it in the preseason  - what's the build? :D

> Woo, Karma Jungle! How does she feel in the new Jungle? I tried her out a time or two before, but have been a bit scared to try it in the preseason  - what's the build? :D

Hehe. I wasn't sure at first. But still wanted to try it. I got my friends to give me a double leash on Wolves then Blue Buff. So that made it easier. Build wise I went with the jungle item that provides smite bonuses in regards to actual jungling as opposed to smiting champions etc. I then built it into the AP item. Following I built a Liandrys and Sorcerers boots. After that I just build tank. I basically built how I would on Elise. 

Good luck ZAPS, update me when you next give her a go.

> Good luck ZAPS, update me when you next give her a go.

I'll have to give it a try - seems like the build is pretty similar to the old-style of Jungle Karma, so hopefully the clears aren't too painful!

Janna game for last week, got my Vayne ADC a penta.
*

> Janna game for last week, got my Vayne ADC a penta.
> *

Very awesome {{champion:40}} ! Now transfer that to ranked hehe! Congrats no the Penta!
i finished a bot game in 9 mins

> i finished a bot game in 9 mins

Faster!

Played a game recently that was indeed a very, very good game. It was such a good game, it could have gone either way. Fortunately the Yasuo and I made the right move and we managed to get a 2v5 ace (I was support Riven).

D/C'd twice, got my first buff stolen by support (No lvl 2)
and still can do this.
Lee is 2 ez
{{champion:64}} {{summoner:11}} = {{item:3070}} Fully stacked

> D/C'd twice, got my first buff stolen by support (No lvl 2)
> and still can do this.
> Lee is 2 ez
> {{champion:64}} {{summoner:11}} = {{item:3070}} Fully stacked

It's pretty hard not to do well as Lee! *thumbs up*
@koala-san Did you get the giant potion? Cause giant is better!
